> Come mothers and fathers
Throughout the land
And don't criticize
What you can't understand
Your sons and your daughters
Are beyond your command
Your old road is
Rapidly agin'.
Please get out of the new one
If you can't lend your hand
For the times they are a-changin'.
>> \- B. Dylan

Posts.EditableText:
How apropos.  Tis sad.  I’ve made about a gazillion suggestions to separate shrunk, vore, adult, furry, etc games from the “classic feel” type games.  I’m not sure how difficult that would be as a website designer, but it would certainly keep excellent, clever games that are nostalgic to the most ardent text adventure enthusiasts from being buried in the muck.  

Ever watch shows or read stories about the bog people?  Well... there’s my analogy.

Posts.EditableText: It might be nice to separate adult games… but then, that makes it harder for people to find what they want. Unless you have two separate feeds.

Posts.EditableText:
All of the games shown in KV's screenshot are "Work in Progress", which means they haven't been submitted for classification, and so can't be labelled 'adult'. The classification scheme needs to change or Work in Progress games treated differently.

A while ago, before Man-o-War left the site, I asked him about the possibility of not showing Work in Progress games in the news feed on the opening page (**edit**: _unless player has adult status_), though still including them in "Latest Activity", as a simple way of making the fetish games less visible. Alas, he didn't reply.

Posts.EditableText: I make adult games and very much don't want them showing up on the front page unless the appropriate options are set. I also don't talk about them here - or at least, not their content - because this forum isn't 18+. It does make me uncomfortable when it comes up!

Posts.EditableText:
I was thinking more about how popular those particular fetish games are and less about adult games in general.

I believe in getting kinky, but there is a line, and, where kink ends, fetish begins.

Digestion happens to be one of my turn-offs. (The Sarlacc Pit is not your friend!)

Also, animals should never be involved in anything erotic. In fact, any (and all) animals have got to get the hell out of the room before anyone moves past first base!

---
I was also thinking that I seem to be in the minority on this one (on this site), judging by the News Feed over the past few months, and who am I to say what someone likes is wrong?

...but I also thought it would be nice to let you guys and gals know why I wasn't constantly posting anymore. It's because the News Feed grosses me out.

I didn't really want anyone to take any action or anything (unless something actually violates the guidelines), but I guess it would be good to separate that stuff so the kids can't see it in their News Feed.
Posts.HTML:
I was thinking more about how popular those particular fetish games are and less about adult games in general.

I believe in getting kinky, but there is a line, and, where kink ends, fetish begins.

Digestion happens to be one of my turn-offs. (The Sarlacc Pit is not your friend!)

Also, animals should never be involved in anything erotic. In fact, any (and all) animals have got to get the hell out of the room before anyone moves past first base!

I was also thinking that I seem to be in the minority on this one (on this site), judging by the News Feed over the past few months, and who am I to say what someone likes is wrong?

...but I also thought it would be nice to let you guys and gals know why I wasn't constantly posting anymore. It's because the News Feed grosses me out.

I didn't really want anyone to take any action or anything (unless something actually violates the guidelines), but I guess it would be good to separate that stuff so the kids can't see it in their News Feed.
